review: This is a great concept, but at the moment it is very limited as to what it can do. Great for streaming YOUTUBE and NETFLIX onto your TV, but my TV already has those functions. You can broadcast whatever is open in your PC's Chrome browser, but not if it's playing a video. You also cannot broadcast your browser pages from your phone/tablet. Great future potential, I just hope they keep updating.
